amendment.description: Amendment makes it a Federal crime to use interstate or foreign commerce to recruit a person to join a criminal gang for the purpose of having that person commit a felony.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 17 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to make it a Federal crime to recruit persons who use interstate or foreign commerce to recruit another person to become a member of a criminal street gang.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallegly amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
